title: [Health] Enhanced Bone Size, Microarchitecture, and Strength in Female Runners with a History of Playing Multidirectional Sports

[Health] A mobile phone app which records a user’s heartbeat could pave the way for doctors to monitor cardiac patients remotely: researchers analysed more than 5,000 heart sound recordings captured on the ‘Echoes’ app and ruled the quality was good enough it could be used by the general population
